PerformanceScriptTimingWindow.summary: The window read-only property of the interface returns a reference to a object representing the window of the container (i.e., either the top-level document or an iframe) in which the long animation frame (LoAF)-causing script was executed.
PerformanceScriptTimingWindow.value: A object, or null if the window is no longer active (the object reference is a WeakRef).
